name: F-ing Genius/Flashy, louche & a smart ass.
description:
2 badges packaged in a library card pocket.  One has a little ribbon attached.

***
They're from batch of pins I did a while back during the time I was attending The Drawing Club which is an awesome drop in, figure drawing studio on Thursday nights in Glendale. I was TOTALLY out of my league. I was drawing next to the dude who directed Little Mermaid. I only figured this out when I secretly thought to myself, why is he drawing the cute girl so beastly, like Ursula from Little Mermaid. Durr, that's why!

Anyhoo, silly phrases, insolent girl faces. If you pick "Flashy, louche, and a smart ass" you are definitely going to have to learn the definition of "louche" it's really good, and no one knows it. Really. Not even your smart friends, which is kind of annoying. So know it. By heart. I'll even help, it means: Of questionable taste or morality; decadent.

name: My sister is famous/WTF?
description:
2 badges packaged in a library card pocket.  One has a little ribbon attached.

Silly phrases, insolent girl faces.  What more could you need?
